features: UNIVERSAL TV COMPATIBILITY: This TV wall mount fits for most 26-65 inch TVs with VESA mounting hole patterns 100x100mm - 400x400mm. Please verify the VESA pattern of TV before purchase. This tv mount can be mounted to 12/16 Inch wood studs, concrete, or brick walls.

MADE WITH HEAVY-GAUGE STEEL: This TV mount features strong dual articulating arms capable of supporting TVs up to 99lbs. Feel confident in the safety and security of your TV with this sturdy TV wall mount!

OPTIMIZED VIEWING EXPERIENCE: This Full motion tv mount is able to reduce glare with vertical tilt ranging from +5 to -15 degrees, customize your viewing angle with +/-45 degree full motion swivel left to right., level the TV by +/-3 degrees to fine-tune the TV's position.

SAVE SPACE: The stable and sturdy TV wall mount extends out 15.34 inches max for viewing and collapses to 3.98 inches from the wall to save space for a cleaner look. Great solution for rooms with multiple viewing areas.

EASY INSTALLATION: Instruction manual and standard mounting hardware for tv mount installing are included for easy installation. Pipishell guarantees this tv wall mount to be free of defects in materials and workmanship, please feel free to contact us anytime, rain or shine.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Pipishell TV Wall Mount is a comprehensive solution for anyone seeking to maximize their home entertainment experience. Designed for 26-65 inches and compatible with LED, LCD, OLED, and 4K TVs, this mount ensures your TV is secure and at the optimal viewing position.

The TV wall mount offers enhanced safety and ease-of-use with features like dual hooks and security locks for sturdy mounting. Its high-quality alloy steel construction ensures durability, making it a reliable choice for securely displaying your TV.
Previous page Next page 1 Purchase Tips 2 Fits TVs Size & Max Load 3 Compatiable TV Vesa Range 4 Installation Notes 5 Preassembled TV Mount

Our PIMFK1 TV wall mount bracket, with its secure features and effortless adjustability, is an essential enhancement to your home entertainment experience. Its high-quality construction promises durability for years of enjoyable viewing.
Previous page Next page 1 Dining Room 2 Bedroom 3 Living Room 4 Meeting Room

TV campatible Fits 26 to 65 inch flat or curved LED OLED QLEKD 4K TVs weight up to 99lbs / 45kg, Compatible with SAMSUNG/LG/SONY/Hisense/VIZIO/TCL/SHARP/Toshiba/Panasonic/philips/SKYWORTH and more VESA mounting hole patterns 100x100/200x100/200x200/300X200/300x300/400x200/400x300/400X400(4"x4"/8"x4"/8"x8"/12"x8"/12"x12"/16"x8"/16"x12"/16"x16") Tilt range 5degrees forward and 15 degrees backward Swivel range 45 degrees left or right for different viewing requirements and rotates 3 degrees for perfect TV level adjustment Distance to wall Extends out 15.34 inch max and folds back to 3.98 inch back from the wall to save space. Wall type 12/16 inch wood stud wall, concrete wall, brick walls, DO NOT INSTALL ON DRYWALL ALONE. Package includes: 1x TV wall mount / 1x Standard mounting hardware /1x 3-Axis magnetic bubble level / 1x User manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! Easy to assemble! Excellent range of motion for us! I bought 3.
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to assemble. Marking and drilling holes was the tough part, but that was due to our home construction. Mount is very sure and steady. Easy to hang the TV and secure it to the wall bracket. Adjustments are easy to do and has a very good range for our needs. I bought 3 mounts because I liked the design and wanted to standardize in our home.--Pipishell TV Wall Mount for 26-65 inch LED LCD OLED 4K TVs up to 99lbs, Full Motion TV Mount--

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mounted on my brick fireplace easily - sturdy and easy!
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice, heavy full motion tv mount. We mounted our 65" Samsung TV above our brick fireplace, and it completely changed the look and feel of our living room in a positive way.One really nice touch is that they provide plenty of hardware options and spacers to put the brackets on various TVs, and it's simple to follow the included well-written instructions.The instructions were also very clear as far as mounting to studs, concrete blocks, or brick. We used a hammer drill to drill the pilot holes, using the paper template as a guide, tapped the anchors into the pilot holes, and used our crescent wrench to attach the mount to the brick. From there we hung the tv on the mount, tightened the bottom screws, and adjusted the angle. It is excellent, and looks good in our room.The one thing that I wish is that the wall bracket was a little bit wider. You've got to hang the TV almost exactly perfectly within maybe a sixteenth to an eighth of an inch, or you'll be "off" on one side - so make sure you've got some help to ensure you're secure on both sides before you the TV go.For the price, quality, sturdiness, versatility, and performance, I am extremely pleased with this purchase. Same-day arrival from Amazon was amazing too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Made, Clear Instructions, Good Value
reviews.reviewText: I watched several video reviews of TV wall mounts before buying this one. The key is making sure the wall frame will align with the wall studs at a location that you want your TV to be mounted. I would recommend checking your wall, finding and marking the stud locations before purchasing. The mount kit was complete, instructions were easy to follow. You will probably need an extra person for mounting the bracket to the wall and installing the TV to the mount. Othewise, the product is well built, good quality and range of motion. It easily handles the 55-inch flat screen TV I mounted on it. Recommended, but do your homework first to make sure it will fit where you want to mount it.

reviews.reviewerName: Mr and Mrs GMr and Mrs G
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nicely made, but falls a little short
reviews.reviewText: The mount came with all parts required for the installation. Everything was laid out well and the instructions showed various types of installs. They don't talk about height measurements, etc., but this wasn't my first mount installation, so I took my time and it came out good. The only major complaint and issue is that they make the mounting plate for the wall and TV exactly 17 inches, which will only fit a 16" wide mounting. If my studs were not in the right places so that the TV will hang even side to side, I'd be in trouble and the mount would have to be returned. So, if you need to slide the TV over an inch or two to center it on your wall, you're SOL. I haven't hung the TV yet, but that's simple. Once again, the front plate that the TV will hang on is for a 16" wide span. You can't move the TV a 1/2 inch or it will fall off the front mounting plate. If they simply would have made the mounting plates 3-4 inches wider, this would have gotten 5 stars. The exact fixed widths, limit your installation options. If your studs aren't exactly lined up so your TV is centered, you will have to install horizontal beams on the wall so the mount can be moved off the stud centerlines. I don't think most people want to see 2x4's hanging on their wall behind the TV. The price was right and the overall quality is good, but beware of the limitations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy install and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Was easy to install into a stud with template. Didn’t take long to install either. Very sturdy for our 70” tv but sometimes leans left and the tv goes a bit crooked. Everything is installed correctly and no loose parts so not sure why this is happening. Easy to correct as if straightening a picture on the wall. Definitely not worried about the tv falling off the wall since it is incredibly sturdy though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well-constructed and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Mounted a 50" UHD 4K, easy to install and excellent range of motion. The bracket is just large enough for 16" centered studs, so make sure that works for you or order extender brackets if you need to center on a wall where the studs are not located where you can center the mount.

Installed few months ago. Working fairly well so far. I have it mounted on a wall, it is holding a 65" TV weighing around 22 kg. Solid build quality, need to hold TV on both sides to move, but it doesn't screw with your setup (tilt UP/DOWN).It works for my setup nicely!
Great product. Very sturdy, easy install. Lost of adjustments and came with a template for easy drilling. Very satisfied

reviews.reviewTitle: Be prepared to the possible need to buy extra pieces. Sturdy and true to its measurements.
reviews.reviewText: I have a Samsung 32inch, model #UN32J4000. This mount does fit my TV but it's at the most minimal adjustment settings. The height of my TV is 17in. The brackets of the tv mount are exactly 17in. The wall plate is much smaller than my tv, so it does hide behind, like the brackets do. I wish it was a closer profile to the wall when extending arms are collapsed. The kit did not come with a level as shown in the pictures. I used my own. The mounting stencil was helpful.I needed M8 30mm-35mm screws for my tv. The kit only has 2 types of M8 Screws, 25mm and 50mm. If you need M6 screws, the kit only has 15mm and 35mm sets; and M4 screws..only 12mm and 40mm. Best check what screws your model has. The instructions were not hard for me to follow, I just didn't have a socket rench handy. After buying a sale priced socket set, I was able to install the 5/16" bolts to secure the wall plate with a 3/8" ratchet, whereas the instructions state you need a 1/2" for wood stud installation. Either will work, so long as you do drill a pilot hole with the exact drill bit they specify to use for the wall type you are using. Again, I had to buy the 7/32" drill bit by itself as mine were a size too small or too big.Did I enjoy the experience of installing this mount? No, however it is manageable.Is the quality reliable and worth 4.5+ stars? Yes.Does this kit seem less efficient than I expected? Yes. I knew going in, somewhere it did say it will fit "most" TVs within the range stated, so I anticipated I may need to buy extra materials. My main critique is the higher profile out from the wall than I'd like it to be. I would have gone for the one arm extender version but my apartment building has my studs situated so that the tv mount must be installed using two studs (mine are 16in apart). Therefore I had to buy this one. Part of me wishes I went with the Mounting Dream brand but I've already done all this work.Glimpse of the instruction manual attached. May update review with a picture once it's fully installed.
This is excellent. The built in level make installation easy. It also has full and SMOOTH range of motion.No issues very pleased with this purchase.
Got this for a bedroom, easy to install & has held up our 65 for months now with no issue (thankfully) instructions were clear and product was exactly as described!
